SEARCH
Package cocoa.controller

Class CategoryController

java.lang.Object
cocoa.controller.CategoryController
@RestController @RequestMapping("category") public class CategoryController extends Object
Controller for managing categories within the application. Provides endpoints for adding, querying, updating, and deleting categories.

This controller interacts with the CategoryService to perform operations on category entities.

    • list

      @GetMapping("/list") public R<List<Category>> list(Category category)
      Queries all animals/pairs under a specific category.
      Parameters:
      category - an object containing query conditions (e.g., type)
      Returns:
      a list of categories matching the query conditions
